There's a famous [blog post](https://www.tidyverse.org/blog/2017/12/workflow-vs-script/) about workflows in R[^1] about a talk Jenny Bryant gave that included this slide:

[^1]: yes, R blog posts can be famous

> If the first line of your R script is
>
> ``` r
> setwd("C:\Users\jenny\path\that\only\I\have")
> ```
>
> I will come into your office and SET YOUR COMPUTER ON FIRE ðŸ”¥.
>
> If the first line of your R script is
>
> ::: {.cell}
> 
> ```{.r .cell-code}
> rm(list = ls())
> ```
> :::
>
> I will come into your office and SET YOUR COMPUTER ON FIRE ðŸ”¥.
